net.sourceforge.JDash.logger
Class DatabaseLogger

java.lang.Object
  net.sourceforge.JDash.logger.DataLogger
      net.sourceforge.JDash.logger.DatabaseLogger
All Implemented Interfaces:
ParameterEventListener, SkinEventListener
public class DatabaseLogger
extends DataLogger
implements ParameterEventListener

This class is the DAO for all database logging activity Whant to read and/or write parameter values to a database, then use this DAO. Note that we only work with HSQLDB.

DatabaseLogger

public DatabaseLogger(java.lang.String logIdSuffix)
               throws java.lang.Exception
Create a new instance of a database logger DAO. This constructor will open the existing database, or create a new one if it doesn't yet exist.

addParameter

public void addParameter(Parameter param)
                  throws java.lang.Exception
Add a parameter to the log. We only track ECUParameters and the TIME parameter, any attempt to add a parameter that isn't supported will simply be ignored. Override
